NeckLVNeckFlexionH.name: Lever Neck Flexion (plate loaded)
NeckLVNeckFlexionH.preparation: Sit on seat in machine. Position padded lever on face. Position body so neck is in line with lever axis. Grasp handles for support.
NeckLVNeckFlexionH.execution: Move head forward by flexing neck until chin touches upper chest. Return head by hyperextending neck and repeat.
NeckLVNeckFlexionH.stabilizers: latissimusdorsi, tricepsbrachii, deltoidposterior, trapeziusmiddle, trapeziuslower, rectusabdominis, rhomboids, obliques

NeckLVLateralNeckFlexionH.name: Lever Lateral Neck Flexion (plate loaded)
NeckLVLateralNeckFlexionH.preparation: Sit on seat in machine with feet apart . Position padded lever on side of head. Center body so neck is in line with lever axis. Grasp handles for support.
NeckLVLateralNeckFlexionH.execution: Move head down to side by laterally flexing neck. Return head to opposite side and repeat. Sit in machine backwards and continue with opposite side.
NeckLVLateralNeckFlexionH.comments: See all muscle used in Lateral Flexion Atlantoccipical  AntlantoaxialCervical SpineThoracic  Lumbar Spine Movement of the Thoracic  Lumbar Spine is typical in this movement. See animation of spinal lateral flexion.
NeckLVLateralNeckFlexionH.synergists: trapeziusupper, splenius, levatorscapulae, iliopsoas, quadratuslumborum, erectorspinae, obliques
